name: Crazy Pizza Delivery Truck
description:
Hate late pizza delivery? Then help out Crazy Pizza Delivery truck deliver its pizza on time!

All you gotta do is collect the pizzas and put them at the back of the truck. Travel the hilly road up and down until you get to your destination. Deliver the pizzas on time and satisfy your customer!

This awesome game is definitely fun! Download now!

How to play the game
> Collect the pizzas
> Deliver the pizzas
> Get the high score

Game Features
> simple controls
> Game for all ages
> Fun game
